Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
06.12.2013 GB SCR18570 Added calls the ICA907A/B and changed number of others parts
29.01.2013 SH SCR17912 Part1/2 Extended range on IMQD_IMQH_TYPE with 9 and changed update of two BMQ005 input parameters
12.04.2012 SH SCR17250 Task "ClearExpiredLegalCollection(2)" --> Added mising test on IMQD_DATEANSWER and IMQD_IMQH_TYPE
02.04.2012 SH SCR17213 Fixed problems with SQL output parameters in "ClearPaymentDifferences" and
"ClearExpiredLegalCollection(2)"; Changed IMQD selection in part 2
01.04.2012 GB SCR17213 Added the Clear already solved requests
17.09.2010 SH SCR15802 Added Part3: WKA differences
14.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
21.08.2009 SH SCR14772 Removed part 3 "nearly expired client certificates"
and removed the test on GSET_YESNO(96) = Y to perform part 1, GSET test has to
be only used to start part 2 "Expired master passwords":
Removed part "Dispute handling" and added BM!015 to delete MQ 38,39,46
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
//11-07-2005 JP SCR #8622 extend program with part 3
02.05.2005 MW SCR#8175 --> 2nd part for expired master passwords
//28-08-2002 JP change handling of type = 5 in IMQD rows SCR #2044
Originally copy of: ICA907 NightChecksCreditView
Part 2 Send email to remind unhandled messages
Part 3. Create Message queue for unhandled messages
-- Clear expired legal collection messages where the debtors have no open balances anymore
-- Clear expired legal collection messages where the debtors have no open balances anymore
-- Clear expired legal collection messages where the debtors have no overdue unpaid invoices anymore

SQL_STMT_U.val: select IMQD_IMQH_TYPE, IMQD_IMQH_ADMNO, IMQD_IMQH_CLNTNO, IMQD_LINENO from :1/IMQD where IMQD_DATEANSWER is null and IMQD_IMQH_TYPE in(1,2,9) and exists (select * from :1/BTCP where BTCP_BTCH_ID = IMQD_BPIV_BTCH_ID and BTCP_LINENO = IMQD_BPIV_BTCP_LINENO and (days(':2') - days(BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT)) > :3)

Text.val: -- Delete the INTERNET_MQ_DETAIL row via BMQ013
-- Delete the INTERNET_MQ_DETAIL row via BMQ013

SQL_STMT_U.val: select IMQD_IMQH_TYPE, IMQD_IMQH_ADMNO, IMQD_IMQH_CLNTNO, IMQD_LINENO from :1/IMQD where IMQD_DATEANSWER is null and IMQD_IMQH_TYPE = 7 and not(exists(select * from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = IMQD_DEBC_NO and INVO_DUEDATE < ':2' and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> :3))

Text.val: -- Delete the INTERNET_MQ_DETAIL row via BMQ013
-- Virtual needed to call BMQ001
-- The MQ_HEADER, MQ_DETAIL and MQ_TEXT rows which will be deleted
-- in the R.S. only have to deleted once
-- Delete IMQD row if Type = 3 or 4
Handle other types = 1, 2, 6, 7, 9
-- Delete IMQH row if no longer IMQD rows exists
The selected CUSR are master users where the password expires tomorrow
eMail to the selected master if email-address available
if no address available, inform another user

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Please note that the MASTER password expires on')&' '&DStr (AddDate ({0,5},0,0,{1,3}),'DD.MM.YYYY')

Text.val: eMail to another user

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Please note that the MASTER password expires on')&' '&DStr (AddDate ({11,5},0,0,{1,3}),'DD.MM.YYYY')
